mapper.select: SELECT board_num as boardNum ,board_name as boardName ,board_content as boardContent ,board_write_date as boardWriteDate ,board_mod_date as boardModDate ,B.mem_id as memNum FROM board A JOIN member B ON A.mem_num = B.mem_num AND board_num = #{boardNum}

SELECT board_num as boardNum ,board_name as boardName ,board_content as boardContent ,board_write_date as boardWriteDate ,board_mod_date as boardModDate ,B.mem_id as memNum FROM board A JOIN member B ON A.mem_num = B.mem_num
WHERE
board_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
board_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
B.mem_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
